class.rdfs:comment: A screening of a movie or other video.
class.rdfs:label: ScreeningEvent

schema:subtitleLanguage.rdfs:comment: Languages in which subtitles/captions are available, in IETF BCP 47 standard format.
schema:subtitleLanguage.rdfs:label: subtitleLanguage

schema:videoFormat.rdfs:comment: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).
schema:videoFormat.rdfs:label: videoFormat

schema:workPresented.rdfs:comment: The movie presented during this event.
schema:workPresented.rdfs:label: workPresented
